author: jorton
msg: fix build on platforms without uint32_t; use struct sockaddr_in rather

author: bjh
msg: OS/2: Include APR_FINFO_LINK in the valid flags by default. As OS/2 doesn't
have sym-links we can be sure the filename isn't one.
Backport of fix to HEAD done a few months ago (r1.39).

author: bjh
msg: OS/2: In apr_file_info_get(), flush any unwritten buffered data before querying
the file's details to ensure the file size is correct. This matches the behaviour
of the unix implementation & make subversion happy.

author: bjh

author: bjh
msg: OS/2: Fix incorrect return of APR_EOF when a 0 length read is requested
